name: ani-web
description: A web application for watching anime.

scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.preview: concurrently "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run preview --prefix client"
